intro: Orthrosanthus chimboracensis subsp. tunariensis, commonly known as the Tunariensis orthrosanthus, is a flowering plant native to the Andean region of South America. The plant typically grows in high-altitude grasslands and rocky slopes, where it thrives in cool, temperate climates. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
